data.text: @DaleyPeterdaley @PAUL_AWOL @BigfryTV Apparently he blocked me and I have never talked to the guy or know who he is. I guess he has some serious problems.
@PAUL_AWOL Cant tell if you are joking, or if you think me tweeting once a month compared to people tweeting every hour is equivalent

@IncurableAnimal @Blvkkn1ght @BigfryTV Pretty much everything on that list had been leaked already. So why not finish with a huge surprise? It won't mean anything unless they get the game right, anyway...which would end up like a non-Battle Royale version of PUBG on smaller maps and with the SOCOM game modes.
@BigfryTV I want a socom 2/3 remaster.  Crossroads/Fox Hunt/Blood Lake/The Ruins.....   Oh man I'd be there day one if they did it.
@BigfryTV Fake news bro I wish it was real
@BigfryTV I hope this is true #socom & pubg on ps4

@Blvkkn1ght @BigfryTV Look at the other games on that list and tell me, if you were the Sony person in charge of arranging that list do you think it would be the best business decision to close the biggest game show of the year on a surprise SOCOM announcement?

I love SOCOM too, but let's be real.
@BigfryTV They saved #SOCOM for last and I think my retirement as a PlayStation player has been expired. #thecomeback
@BigfryTV Socom plus pubg on ps4, guna be a good year!
@BigfryTV I so hope it's real for 2 reasons, Bloodborne 2 and SOCOM.
